content:
Departures Participate tag:www.kcet.org,2010-01-19:/socal/departures/participate//761 2015-02-12T20:46:12Z Departures Participate is where you get to upload your own stories \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd rather than listen to ours! - and guide us through your neighborhood. You can tell us where to go, what to eat, what to wear. You can help us remember what we\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve forgotten and help us understand where we are headed. Our goal is to peel back some of the layers that surround Los Angeles and reveal a collective narrative built out of memory and personal history. Movable Type Pro 4.38 How Did Michele Serros' Work Impact Your Life? tag:www.kcet.org,2014:/socal/departures/participate//761.79550 2015-01-08T00:05:41Z 2015-02-12T20:46:12Z As many of us revisit her books this week, we are reacquainted with her family, friends, and those experiences that we so deeply connected with that spurred us to share with our own friends.

As many of us revisit her books this week, we are reacquainted with her family, friends, and those experiences that we so deeply connected with that spurred us to share with our own friends.
